abstract: Ohio state officials prevent Marian Thompson, widow of exotic animal owner Terry Thompson, from retrieving six animals that have been quarantined; Terry Thompson shot himself after setting loose 56 exotic animals, majority of which were hunted down and shot.
snippet: State officials on Thursday prevented the widow of the man the police say set free dozens of exotic animals from the family’s wildlife preserve from retrieving the six surviving animals.
lead_paragraph: State officials on Thursday prevented the widow of the man the police say set free dozens of exotic animals from the family’s wildlife preserve from retrieving the six surviving animals.

headline.main: Ohio: Captured Animals Are to Stay at Columbus Zoo
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Captured Animals Are to Stay at Columbus Zoo
headline.seo: Ohio: Surviving Exotic Animals Are to Stay at Zoo
